attributes.action: Social Media companies & the Gov should do more to combat hate & racial abuse
attributes.additional_details: The number of hate and racial abuse online is increasing. Just look at how many black football players have been abused.  This is despite the Black Lives Matter awareness.  People need to understand they cannot get away with hate or racial abuse online.  Policies need to be put in place so that these individuals can be easily prosecuted.
attributes.background: Social Media companies & the Government should do more to combat hate & racial abuse.  There needs to be policies in place which make social media companies more accountable.  Policies also need to be put in place to give authorities more power to catch and prosecute these individuals.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 
	
You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
